title: North to the sun
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The story of the development of the rich tropical area around Cairns in the northern parts of Queensland. Shows the primary industries of the region including timber, maize and tobacco; its potentialities for development and its attraction as a homeland for newcomers.
creator_credit_for_label: John Martin-Jones and Australian National Film Board
